channel.description: Recent content in H2020 on OKF

item.title: Front-end Developer (w/m) für DIGIWHIST gesucht
item.description: Front-end Developer (w/m) für DIGIWHIST - ein H2020 EU-Forschungsprojekt “The Digital Whistleblower. Fiscal Transparency, Risk Assessment and Impact of Good Governance Policies Assessed” (DIGIWHIST). Part-Time (50%) limited term: 50% FTE, project ends February 2018 Salary: depending on experience, we use the Berlin public servant salary bands Start: Ideally October 2015 Application deadline: Deadline extended until 15 September 2015 The Open Knowledge Foundation Germany is one of the leading NGOs in the field of Open Knowledge, Open Data and Transparency in Germany.
